Articles.Content:
I guess by now, the most of the KSP Player who watched the 0.22 Squadcast and began gathering Sciencepoints after the release, have completed the Techtree and spent the surplus of their points to the parts that they needed least.

Since the day you do that, you will never hear the Music played in the R&D-Complex again unless you go their to crank up the volume and let it play for hours

My intention to open this thread is, that I am looking for a way to move the Music to the VAB/SPH and Space because for me it is quite refreshing to have some new tunes beeing played.

KSP is too quiet right now, because a lot of sounds have are still missing and a lot of it atmosphere is lost or compensated by the soundtracks, which unfortnately I am getting tired of listening to when heared too often.

If you have a solution to move the R&D-soundtrack, please take a note below.

And if you also think KSP could use some more Sounds and Atmosphere, look here

I wish there was some music when flying about in the atmosphere and driving on the surface. I always like it when you clear the atmosphere and the you're-in-space music start up. Flying about in the atmosphere isn't too bad as you have engine noise, but driving on the Mun is always weird cos it's so quiet. Chatterer helps a bit, but I agree we need more sounds.
Good to know I am not alone with this
At first the music was a great improvement, but after hours listening to the SAME jazz tune in the VAB, I just play with music off.
actually, it'd be great if we can have custom playlists from our own mp3 collection

actually, it'd be great if we can have custom playlists from our own mp3 collection

That would be great.
